zone.line: It climb the crags of life, step after step,
Which wound it, as ice wounds unsandalled feet
It yet remains supreme o'er misery
Aspiring ..unrepressed; yet soon to fall:
a wonder
Even now have I begotten, the strange might,
That fatal child, the terror of the Earth,
Who waits but till the destined Hour arrive 20
Bearing from Demogorgons vacant throne
might
The dreadful robe of ever living limbs
awful
Which clothed that shadowy spirit unbeheld—
To redescend
He shall descend trample out the spark...
Pour forth Heavens wine Idaean Ganymede
And let it fill the daedal cups like fire
divine
And from the flower-inwoven soil of Heaven
Ye all
Let the triumphant harmonies arise
under
As dew from the Earth beneath the twilight
circling stars;
Drink, be the nectar living thro your veins 30
The seal of joy, ye everliving Gods
Till exultation burst in one wide voice
Like music from Elysian winds.— & thou
